comment.summary: A theme toggle button with slots for light and dark mode icons.

comment.raw:
/**
 * Whether `initTheme` should be called automatically.
 *
 * @default
 *
 * true
 */

props.name: transitionOptions
props.type: { y: number; duration: number; easing: (t: number) => number; }

comment.summary: Fires when the toggle is clicked and provides event.detail.theme as the new theme.
